entry.value: SELECT distinct lower(zone) as zone, lower(environment) as environment FROM FLOWFILE WHERE zone IS NOT NULL AND zone <> ''

select distinct swidtag as swidtag, sku as sku, product as product_name, editor as editor, version as product_version, metric as metric, acquired_licenses as acquired_licenses, licenses_under_maintenance as maintenance_licenses, avg_unit_price as unit_price, avg_maintenance_unit_price as maintenance_unit_price, "maintenance_start" as maintenance_start, "maintenance_end" as maintenance_end, (avg_unit_price * acquired_licenses) as total_license_cost, COALESCE(avg_maintenance_unit_price,0) * COALESCE(licenses_under_maintenance,0) as total_maintenance_cost, (COALESCE(avg_unit_price,0) * COALESCE(acquired_licenses,0)) + (COALESCE(avg_maintenance_unit_price,0) * COALESCE(licenses_under_maintenance,0)) as total_cost from FLOWFILE WHERE sku IS NOT NULL AND product IS NOT NULL AND editor IS NOT NULL AND metric IS NOT NULL AND acquired_licenses IS NOT NULL AND avg_unit_price IS NOT NULL AND sku <> '' AND product <> '' AND editor <> '' AND metric <> '' AND acquired_licenses <> '' AND avg_unit_price <> ''

SELECT distinct lower(zone_serverhostname) as zone_serverhostname, lower(type) as type, lower(module_name) as module_name, lower(server_hostname) as server_hostname, lower(vm_hostname) as vm_hostname, lower(zone) as parentid FROM FLOWFILE WHERE zone_serverhostname IS NOT NULL AND server_hostname IS NOT NULL AND zone_serverhostname <> '' AND server_hostname <> ''

select distinct swidtag as swidtag, product as name, editor as editor, version as version, '' as category, '' as IsOptionOf from FLOWFILE WHERE swidtag IS NOT NULL AND product IS NOT NULL AND editor IS NOT NULL AND version IS NOT NULL AND swidtag <> '' AND product <> '' AND editor <> '' AND version <> ''

SELECT distinct redhat_swidtag as swidtag, lower(zone_serverhostname) as equipment_id, '0' as nbusers FROM FLOWFILE WHERE redhat_swidtag IS NOT NULL AND zone_serverhostname IS NOT NULL and redhat_swidtag <> '' and zone_serverhostname <> ''
